text: Dona Flor and Her Two Husbands () is a 1976 Brazilian fantasy comedy movie directed by Bruno Barreto and is based on the 1966 novel of the same name by Jorge Amado. It stars José Wilker, Sônia Braga and Mauro Mendonça. It was remade as Kiss Me Goodbye in 1982 starring Sally Field, James Caan and Jeff Bridges. ==Other websites== * * Category:1976 comedy movies Category:1976 fantasy movies Category:Brazilian movies Category:Movies directed by Bruno Barreto Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in the 1940s
title: Dona Flor and Her Two Husbands
